abstract: Robert Lopez will help his "Book of Mormon" collaborators Trey Parker and Matt Stone write an episode of their animated series "South Park" that is planned for next week.
snippet: Robert Lopez will help his "Book of Mormon" collaborators Trey Parker and Matt Stone write an episode of their animated series "South Park" that is planned for next week.

headline.main: 'South Park' Provides the Stage for a 'Book of Mormon' Reunion
